name: Night Drive (Muulk)
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 103: Darkness.

I tried to make it a browser game but ran into issues. Please download to play.

Information:

  • Dodge the incoming cars
  • Each time you move your flashlight gets weaker
  • Collect batteries to recharge your flashlight
  • Try to get the highest score!

Controls:

  • Up/Down arrow keys - Move
  • Space - Play
  • T - Mute music
  • Escape - Quit game

Credit:

I designed and programmed the game however have used some free art and music assets:

  • Motorcycle adapted by Muulk from surt's Race or Die pack
  • Road by (www.davidstenfors.com)
  • Background art adapted from (https://wallpapercave.com/w/uwp1696607)
  • dklon's engine SFX pack
  • Xanadon't by Mystery Mammal for background music
